abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column notes Mark F Spangler, former leader of the National Association of Personal Financial Advisors, is accused of investing his clients’ money into private companies without their knowledge; discusses serious risks of investing in private placement deals.
snippet: Mark F. Spangler, the former leader of the National Association of Personal Financial Advisors, is accused of investing his clients’ money into private companies without their knowledge.

keywords.value: National Assn of Personal Financial Advisors

keywords.value: Private Placements (Non-Public Offerings) and Mini IPOs

lead_paragraph: Mark F. Spangler, the former leader of the National Association of Personal Financial Advisors, is accused of investing his clients’ money into private companies without their knowledge.

headline.seo: Financial Adviser Mark Spangler Accused of Securities Fraud
